name: Time Labyrinth
description:
Hi guys this is old style thriller game.

Here is a let's play video :

You in a big maze and you have to find way out before time runs out but be careful for traps.

This is my first game I spend a lot of time making it if you like my game I'm more than happy.

Unfortunately I made this game in unity3d (4) and when i finished my game I got myself unity3d (5) and upload my project to unity3d (5) and lost everything so unfortunately there will be no update on that game, but I'm working on another game from scratch on unity3d(5).
